scripts.test: npm cache clean --force && npx sequelize-cli db:drop --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:create --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env test && jest
scripts.dev: npm cache clean --force && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env test && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env test && jest
scripts.start: node index.js && npx sequelize-cli db:drop --env production
